DOC.criteria: • Diagnosis Primary Open Angle Glaucoma Advanced glaucoma intraocular pressure high 21mmHg one topical medication ( least 2 month ) Visual acuity worse 6/6 Age 21 year Poor candidate additional filtration surgery • Age less 21 year Any eye surgery within 2 month enrolment Any patient rubeosis Unable give inform consent
